attributes.action: Provide wheelie bins in Calderdale for recycling to prevent excess litter.
attributes.background:
Im sick of seeing litter scattered around our streets.
Mainly recycling ie milk bottles & cartons & recycling containers. 
Kirklees have wheelie bins and their streets are by far cleaner.
I wish Calderdale Council would follow in suit. Surely this would lower the cost of Street Cleansing needed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Providing wheelie bins is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
